tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
	feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id UUID,
	feedback_text TEXT,
	rating INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profile (
	customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name TEXT,
	email TEXT,
	phone_number TEXT,
	country TEXT
);
